messages.subject: Reassurance for Kim (all Kims, I guess)
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Kim in Missouri MOM of Dylan et al. I only vaguely remembered having been called a name and REALLY couldn t/wouldn t remember the name of who did so, so
messages.messageBody:
Dear Kim in Missouri MOM of Dylan et al.

I only vaguely remembered having been called a name and REALLY
couldn't/wouldn't remember the name of who did so, so for those who do
remember names well I understand your clarification, but for me, I SO don't
keep track of who said what that I honestly, truly didn't remember what
anyone had said about where they lived or what kids they had or anything. I
read the posts for the ideas and the stories and very often don't even look
at the names.

Sandra
